import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg._
import org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.{KMeans, KMeansModel}
import org.apache.spark.rdd._
import org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame

val rawData = sc.textFile("s3://ds-etl/data/kddcup.data")

paragraphs.text: val labelsAndData = rawData.map { line =>    val buffer = line.split(',').toBuffer;    buffer.remove(1, 3);    val label = buffer.remove(buffer.length-1);    val vector = Vectors.dense(buffer.map(_.toDouble).toArray);    (label,vector)};labelsAndData.sample(false, 0.05).toDF().show(false)

result.msg:
distance: (a: org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector, b: org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector)Double
distToCentroid: (datum: org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector, model: org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.KMeansModel)Double

paragraphs.text: def clusteringScore(data: RDD[Vector], k: Int) = {     val kmeans = new KMeans();    val model = kmeans.setSeed(0).setRuns(20).setK(k).run(data);    (model, data.map(datum => distToCentroid(datum, model)).mean());}

val finalModel = clusteringScore(data, 100)._1;val sample = data.map(datum =>finalModel.predict(datum) + ":" + datum.toArray.mkString(","));save(sample.sample(false, 0.05).toDF(), "s3a://ds-etl/data/")
